A

AbstractConfiguration - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
 
AbstractConfiguration() - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.AbstractConfiguration
 

C

Configuration - Interface in org.dayatang.configuration
用于读取全局性配置信息的接口。
ConfigurationDbImpl - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
ConfigurationDbImpl为读取/回写配置信息的工具类，并将配置信息写入数据库， 具体配置大致采用 ConfigurationFileImpl.getXxx(key)的方式读取。
ConfigurationDbImpl(DataSource) - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.ConfigurationDbImpl
 
ConfigurationDbImpl(DataSource, String, String, String) - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.ConfigurationDbImpl
 
ConfigurationDbUtils - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
 
ConfigurationDbUtils(DataSource, String, String, String) - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.ConfigurationDbUtils
 
ConfigurationException - Exception in org.dayatang.configuration
 
ConfigurationException() - Constructor for exception org.dayatang.configuration.ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationException(String) - Constructor for exception org.dayatang.configuration.ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.dayatang.configuration.ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.dayatang.configuration.ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationFactory - Class in org.dayatang.configuration
数据库工厂，用于隐藏配置类的具体实现
ConfigurationFactory() - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.ConfigurationFactory
 
ConfigurationFactoryImpl - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
Created by yyang on 14-2-5.
ConfigurationFactoryImpl() - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.ConfigurationFactoryImpl
 
ConfigurationFileImpl - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
ConfigurationFileImpl为读取/回写配置文件的工具类，一个实例大概对应了一个物理配置文件，可以使用 getXxx("aa.conf")，getXxx("/a/b","xx.conf") 获得/a/b/xx.conf配置文件。 具体配置大致采用 ConfigurationFileImpl.getXxx(key)的方式读取。
ConfigurationUrlImpl - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
ConfigurationUrlImpl为读取远程配置文件的工具类，一个实例大概对应了一个远程配置文件，具体配置大致采用 ConfigurationUrlImpl.getXxx(key)的方式读取。

O

org.dayatang.configuration - package org.dayatang.configuration
配置接口及工厂 Created by yyang on 14-2-5.
org.dayatang.configuration.impl - package org.dayatang.configuration.impl
配置和配置工厂的具体实现类。用户代码不应该依赖于这个包中的类 Created by yyang on 14-2-5.

P

PropertiesFileUtils - Class in org.dayatang.configuration.impl
解决Java Properties文件的编码问题，避免iso8859-1到utf8的相互转义
PropertiesFileUtils(String) - Constructor for class org.dayatang.configuration.impl.PropertiesFileUtils
 

R
